info.name: Tumblr: Custom IM Colors
info.description: Ditch your friends' florescent green IM backgrounds for something more classy.
info.additionalInfo:
Because I originally made this for visibility purposes, I've only designed this style for the classic darker-background + lighter-message-bubble theme. I might update it to support inverted colors in the future.

2019-02-04:
- Added "Active in the last X hours" to the list of text that should be white
- Updated the default colors to match tumblr's new theme. For reference, the old theme's default colors were: Header: #263141 // Background: #2B384A // Message Bubble: #FFFFFF // Send Button: #529ECC
